reviews.review_msg: Horrible prof regardless of how you take the class with him.  Do not take distance ed with him, because he provides little feedback, does not return midterm or give you feedback on midterm and uses his own textbook which is completely useless.  Impossible to understand material from textbook, and has almost no solutions to problems.
The prof teaches slowly and gives lots of examples, BUT his quizzes and exams are EXTREMELY hard.
Jorge does not teach. Jorge does not try to teach. Jorge is not organized. Jorge read previous prof notes and Jorge copy down. Jorge give easy exam but no teach so easy exam  hard exam.

Probably the best prof I've ever had. Just to give you an idea how good he was: First third of semester I slacked off. I failed the first midterm. I didn't understand anything and was so lost. Didn't even understand the textbook. I literally was gonna drop it. Then I started listening to him and copying his notes down. Final mark was A-.

I took 305 and Joan as a person is very kind, and sweet but as a professor honestly she is terrible.  Avoid this course with her at all costs.  Her lectures make no sense, even though she spends the entire time speaking none of it makes sense.  Tests are ridiculously difficult I failed this course the first time, and squeezed a C second time around

worst prof ive ever had. the words that comes out of her mouth are incomprehensible. the words themselves make sense but together its gibberish. there are no textbooks used for this class, class notes from another prof, tim swartz, is handed out and it sucks. only way to gain better understanding is to borrow another textbook from the library
can't speak proper english and is boring as hell to listen to in class.
very good prof but final exam impossible and midterms quit hard

This is one of the worse profs ever...quizzes and the final are impossible to do unless you REALLY FULLY understand material and are able to comprehend any kind of question he can throw at you in any kind of wording.  If you ask him for help, he explains it the same way and expects you to understand it the 2nd time.  HORRIBLE.....

He prints out the notes then comes to class and reads them.. His lectures are bland and uninformative. there are no reccomended problems to study, so you're on your own to study. you're better off reading the text than going to class.
he lectures on one thing, and the homework is always on something completely unrelated
Lousy Prof, friendly but can't teach.
